text: Maurice Hayes (8 July 1927 - 23 December 2017) was an Irish politician. He was an independent member of the 21st and 22nd Seanads, nominated as a senator by the Taoiseach. Hayes was born in County Down in Northern Ireland. He died at a hospital in Belfast on 23 December 2017 from frontotemporal dementia at the age of 90.Former senior civil servant and GAA figure Dr Maurice Hayes dies age 90 ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from frontotemporal dementia Category:Irish politicians
title: Maurice Hayes
